query: gross margin or net interest margin for the last 5 quarters
expanded_query: Retrieve disclosures referencing "gross margin" or "net interest margin" within the context of "Consolidated Statements of Income," "Statements of Operations," or "Financial Performance." Include synonymous terms such as "gross profit margin," "net interest spread," or "net interest income margin," and consider both quarterly and annual periods, e.g., "quarter ended," "fiscal quarter," "fiscal year," or "annual period," focusing on the most recent five quarters.
